name: codefru music
description: A Telegram user bot for music vc play in eaiser way

API_ID.description: Telegram app id; leave as it is

SESSION.description: Pyrogram session string, get it from https://replit.com/@codesfru/genStr#main.py or running @stringfrubot in telegram

SUDOERS.description: ID of sudo users who have special access (separate multiple ids with space)

PREFIX.description: Bot commad prefix or handler (separate multiple prefix with space)

LANGUAGE.description: An available bot language (read the README.md for more info)

QUALITY.description: An available stream quality (read the README.md for more info)
